title: Deep Learning Practice Competency Enhancement: Equity-Centered Mathematics Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Mathematics Education Theory and Understanding of Elementary Curriculum
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate four instructional design elements (time allocation, material selection, activity structuring, assessment system) based on analytical criteria.
Learners can design math lessons reflecting the characteristics of marginalized student groups according to equity principles.
Learners can plan smartphone-based learning activities in resource-constrained technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
